text: Andrey Verveykin (born 3 January 1966) is a Kazakhstani ski jumper. He competed at the 1992 Winter Olympics and the 1994 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Kazakhstani male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of the Unified Team Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Kazakhstan Category:Ski jumpers at the 1992 Winter Olympics Category:Ski jumpers at the 1994 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Andrey Verveykin
